mapper.select: SELECT M.ID , NICKNAME , NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , BLIND , CASE ISACTIVE WHEN 'Y%' THEN '../../resources/img/admin/icon/active.svg' WHEN 'N' THEN '../../resources/img/admin/icon/inactive.svg' ELSE '../../resources/img/admin/icon/active.svg' END AS ISACTIVE FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN M_NORMAL N ON(M.ID = N.ID) WHERE GRADE = 'N'
